description: ZFS Combined - Status panels at top for immediate health assessment, expandable rows for drill-down into pool details, datasets, shares, and anomaly detection.

panels.description: 1 = pool is ONLINE, 0 = pool is NOT online. Green is healthy.
panels.title: Pool Health

panels.description: Percentage of pool capacity used. Warning at 80%, critical at 90%.
panels.title: Pool Capacity %

panels.description: 1 = service is running, 0 = service is down. Green is healthy.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Number of active resilver or scrub operations. 0 = idle.
panels.title: Resilver / Scrub

panels.description: Estimated days until pool is full based on 7-day linear trend. Negative or very large values indicate stable or shrinking usage.
panels.title: Days Until Full

panels.description: 1 = ZFS commands are succeeding, 0 = ZFS commands are failing.
panels.title: Exporter Up

panels.description: Pool allocated and free space over time, stacked to show total capacity.
panels.title: Pool Usage Over Time

panels.description: Current allocated vs total size for each pool.
panels.title: Pool Usage Bars

panels.description: Pool fragmentation ratio over time. High fragmentation can impact performance.
panels.title: Fragmentation

panels.description: Top datasets sorted by used space (descending).
panels.title: Top Datasets by Used Space

panels.description: Datasets with NFS sharing enabled (sharenfs != off).
panels.title: NFS Shares

panels.description: Datasets with SMB sharing enabled (sharesmb != off).
panels.title: SMB Shares

panels.description: Service up/down status over time. 1 = running, 0 = down.
panels.title: Service Status Timeline

panels.description: Dataset daily growth rate derived from 1-hour derivative, converted to bytes per day.
panels.title: Growth Rate (bytes/day)

panels.description: Datasets where current usage deviates from the 7-day average. Shows deviation in bytes and as a ratio of the standard deviation.
panels.title: Deviation from 7d Average

panels.description: Predicted free bytes remaining in each pool based on 7-day linear trend. Crossing zero means the pool is predicted to fill.
panels.title: Pool Fill Prediction

title: ZFS Combined
